title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: November 11, 2022, 02:39:21 PMLast edit: November 28, 2022, 02:17:33 PM by Hhampuz
content: Marsbet.com is coming hot out of the gates with their take on what an online casino can and should look like. With an extensive catalogue of games as well as a sportsbook, live casino, bingo and more coupled with some great bonuses and promotions. To help spread awareness we are launching this Signature Campaign and if you are a quality poster who frequents the gambling boards we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 25 constructive posts each week that you participate in order to get paid.Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts each week in the gambling boards in order to get paid. These 10 will count towards the 25 post weekly requirement.Do not have legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member.If you receive negative feedback from a DT-member during your stay in this campaign for a legitimate reason you may be removed without notice or payment.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and rounds, this thread, any campaign/bounty thread as well as places where your signature is not displayed will not count towards the weekly requirement.You need to have received a minimum of 5 merit in the last 120 days to join this campaign.Do not wear any other Signature or Avatar during your stay or you will be removed without payment and notice.Do not enroll your main and alt in this campaign or you will be removed and blacklisted from any and all of my campaigns.Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC Address each Tuesday.Weeks will run from Tuesdays > Mondays with the cut-off taking place each Monday at 23:59:59 according to my timezone (CET).This Campaign will be open for Full Members, Sr. Members, Hero Members and Legendary Members.This Campaign will initially be open for 1 week (escrowed funds), with a high likelihood of continuing past that.Marsbet reserves the right to cancel and/or make changes to this campaign at their own discretion. Each started week will be paid out in full!Payouts and Positions:7x Full Members - $40 in BTC/Week.9x Sr. Members - $55 in BTC/Week.10x Hero/Legendary Members - $70 in BTC/Week.The Signatures: Full
